website_summaries.verdict: Consider the Mellow if you're a moderate sous vide enthusiast who wants to make sure dinner is ready exactly when you want it. If you're still not sure about cooking your food in a water bath, go for a less expensive immersion circulator instead.
pros: The Mellow countertop sous vide machine cooks food evenly and is easy to use
The built-in refrigeration element lets you keep your food in cold water until you're ready for the Mellow to start cooking
This lets you schedule the exact time you want your food to be ready without worrying about it sitting in tepid water all day
cons: The size of the container limits just how much you can cook in the Mellow
The app is counterintuitive when it comes to cooking your own recipes
And the Mellow doesn't offer many cooking tips unlike other sous vide appliance apps, so you need to come with some knowledge of how to flavor your dishes

customer_reviews.title: Bate and Switch
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Mellow in February and use it once maybe twice a month. It is a great product. Then today we are forced to pay for a subscription to continue using the product. The entire point of purchasing this sous vide was the integrated app. I now have a worthless $200 appliance. I want a refund or to be grandfathered into the app use. This is unacceptable and I hope Mellow or Amazon has integrity in regards to this bate and switch!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Kruger

customer_reviews.title: They charge you for the recipes that they promised for free
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my Mellow for some time now. I have two major complaints about it. First, if their servers are down, which does happen, the device is completely useless, as there are no manual controls, and you can only use the device through wifi by going through their servers, even if you are standing right next to it. Second, they just started trying to sell me access to the recipes and cooking history that they billed as a free service and that every other manufacturer of water circulators gives away for free. In my mind, this is a completely unacceptable and unethical business practice. You can't trust this company. Buy a different water circulator.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Great with a few setbacks.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use cooker. Love being able to control it away from home. Biggest setback is that it wants you to add ice if you’re leaving something for an extended period of time. Not a big hassle if you have a fridge with an ice maker, I unfortunately do not.
customer_reviews.author: Scotcheroo

customer_reviews.title: Once recommended to friends but then they made it a subscription
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great but now you have to pay a monthly subscription to use most of the advertised features. You can no longer schedule food to cook at a certain time or use recipes (including ones you created). You can still manually start cooling or cooking. My friend had issues with his Mellow, the tank was leaking, and he had a horrible time trying to contact support and getting a warranty repair (he eventually gave up). Unless they allow you to schedule your own recipes without a subscription I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. I was worried that it would be another piece of crap it ends up in my garage or taking up space on my kitchen counters but that was not the case. I use it pretty frequently I would say one twice a week. If you get yourself a good blow toward it really helps so that you can make what year cooking crispy and keep it juicy on the inside after it's been slow-cooked in the SV
customer_reviews.author: Byllee

customer_reviews.title: I'm Stoked. I can finally cook like an All-Star Chef!
customer_reviews.text: Mellow's intuitive app and fool proof cooking method is just what I needed. The only thing I would like to see that would be helpful, would be more recipes on the web-site and app...job well done Mellow!
customer_reviews.author: Skinny

customer_reviews.title: Meal Automation is the future and we are glimpsing it with Mellow.
customer_reviews.text: Love this device. It is extremely easy to use and having it makes life a lot easier. I come home from work and a hot dinner is immediately ready. No more eating fast food.
customer_reviews.author: Bobba Fett

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: The ability to put your food in before you leave for work can’t be overstated. This is the most amazing product. And using a flame thrower for the final sear is pure enjoyment
customer_reviews.author: Lance Musser

customer_reviews.title: Huge timesaver
customer_reviews.text: The chilling feature on this a gamechanger that makes eating amazing sous vide meals possible with ~10 min of prep a day It is incredibly feature rich compared to any other sous vide cooker, especially in the price point
customer_reviews.author: abysmal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I personally didn't want to like it but my wife wanted it. Something about cooking in water. Boy was I wrong. I love it. Never had a better roast. Makes London Broil taste like Filet. Even chicken tastes better. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grade/time cooker. No overcooking anymore.
customer_reviews.text: It's coming with ios/android app that allows to: 1. Set temperature, timer and when to start for manual cooking. Very convenient for cooking for morning, when you wake up and when you're coming back from work. 2. Set program for specific food type(veggies, steak, fish, etc.) and have a recipe handy with grades, like medium, light, strong etc. I use it, when I want to cook something exactly the way I like it. Medium cooked steak is always cooked perfectly. 3. Fun with exploring new recipes from other people or from mellow company itself.
customer_reviews.author: Dzianis Zhauenrchyk

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is terrific. Being able to have food cooked while you’re away is amazing. The ONLY downside is the size of the tank. I wish it were bigger, but it’s not that big of an issue.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easier than a slow cooker and more precise! I never worry about over cooking steak or salmon anymore. perfection!

customer_reviews.text: It never worked we ask for help we never got call back I want help in working the machine can you contact me.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Mellow -- it has changed the way my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the Mellow -- it has changed the way my wife and I prepare dinner on a daily basis!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Elkins

customer_reviews.title: I love Mellow!
customer_reviews.text: Mellow looks amazing in my kitchen and my food has never tasted better. I’m loving the convenience of walking through the door at the end of a long day knowing dinner is pretty much cooked. Being a busy professional it is going to be a huge benefit for me to eat healthy and spend less time in the kitchen. I am excited to explore new recipes with my Mellow!
customer_reviews.author: Mahan Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best sous vide appliance I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I adore this machine! The ability to put food in at night and have it ready for breakfast, or in the morning to come home to cooked dinner is awesome. The refrigerator feature is what is missing from all other sous vide appliances and is a game changer. The app works perfectly and it's a very smart machine, reminding me the food is ready or the water temperature is too high, etc. I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Corona

customer_reviews.title: Highly impressed, was worth the wait!
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and everything you need to get going is right in the box. Got ours today and immediately got some chicken breasts going for dinner. The app walked is through everything and it turned out amazing. As soon as I cracked open that bag my whole family perked up to that wonderful aroma. Can't wait for dinner tomorrow! We've had our eyes on Mellow for years and finally pulled the trigger with the price drop.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lamb

customer_reviews.title: the company is unethical with the bait and switch subscription approach
customer_reviews.text: When the device was sold, there was an app, it was useful and practical. Now, the monthly subscription is required to use the appliance. This is not typical for kitchen devices and the way it was done is unethical. This sort of shenanigans should lead to class-action lawsuit against the company, although I realize that the company probably put enough clauses in the agreement to enable such a cheat on the customers.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer support, No Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I have had this device stop working on me for days at a time because their app which requires a server connection was down for days. There is ZERO phone support and even when I put in a ticket it took them 2 months to respond. When they finally did they said there was no issue and closed my case. Fast forward a few months later still under supposed warranty of 1 year, the top tank started to leak. I reached out again asking for support and they flat out said there is no way to replace it. Steer CLEAR of this product if something goes wrong you get zero support and no replacement options.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!! Bait & Switch!
customer_reviews.text: They sold their units with an app that you use to control the unit. Now you have to pay $5/mo or $48/year just to use the app after you already paid for the unit! Bad business decision! Buyer beware! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for week night dinners!
customer_reviews.text: I was a pre-order supporter of this amazing machine. I’ve been using Mellow for about 7 months now. They keep updating the app with new features and it has changed week night meals in my home. I can put in frozen steaks, chicken, or fish in the morning and dinner is ready at the time I specify. No more overcooking your food. The perfect temp every time. Mellow is also starting to build a community of followers who share ideas and recipes. Check out the group on Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hannifin

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and poor quality manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. When it works it's great but most of the time it doesn't work. My heating element went out after a year. Mellow won't replace because it's out of warranty by a few months and then to add insult to injury offered me $50 towards a replacement. The cooling function never worked unless you added lots of ice and the app is clunking. Spend your money on a ChefStep.
customer_reviews.author: Drumnakilly

customer_reviews.title: Dependent upon a Network connection
customer_reviews.text: While the unit is excellent, it is completely dependent upon having an active connection to the internet. If the connection is not working, you forget your password or other related software issue the unit becomes nothing more than an expense boat anchor. If this were not an absolute requirement to use the machine, I would rate it 5 but due to the fact that you CANNOT USE the unit if the network is down or you cannot log into your application on your phone (your phone is dead, you don't remember where it is and other related issues). This is why I cannot recommend this unit
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: App doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back when it was $400. Recently the app locked up during startup. Installed the app on andriod and ios and the app is still broken. Having no manual controls is a huge design flaw. If there is an app issue then the hardware is junk
customer_reviews.author: Vincent szeto

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to pay a monthly fee to use...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this device well enough at first when I bought it for about twice what it is going for right now. However, after purchasing a premium product at a premium price the mellow team decided to basically make the app useless unless you subscribe for about $80/yr. I'll be doing what I can to get my money back after this bait and switch. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Smaranda D

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who want great food on busy schedules
customer_reviews.text: Honestly worth every penny. The differentiator is the ability to cool the food for any duration before it’s time to cook and eat. I put the food in the mellow at night, set the timer for when I get home the next day, and the food is kept cool until it needs to cool to meet my timers ready time. So much better than any other cooker or sous vide because of this and makes meal prep a breeze. I have been using a few month and am considering buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: gstep

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Unethical company and false advertising. I’ve had the machine for several years and now they took away the core features of the product with no notification and made it necessary to have a monthly fee to use it. Even if you were to go to their website today you will see no mention of the cost of this. It looks like it comes with all the necessary bells and whistles and it does NOT. There also seems to be rumors they may go out of business which would leave users with a giant expensive paper weight. It’s a shame as previously I loved this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Mackimmie

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer Sous-Vide!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal device. Easy to setup, app is a breeze. Love coming home to finished meals!
customer_reviews.author: avaknowsall

customer_reviews.title: Why do I need to hook up another device...poor design
customer_reviews.text: Should have its own controls without the need for any external anything...would buy it then. Surly a control panel is cheap enough to make these days...everything has one...but this.
customer_reviews.author: M. O.

customer_reviews.title: unable to be used if bought second hand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device out of curiosity, as used. The device was still paired with the previous owner’s account and it was no possible way to reset it. The only suggestion I received was to contact the previous owner. Appreciate the high-tech, but after all this product is only a fancy crock pot. I don’t see any point in making it unable to be resetted and reused by somebody else if reseled. I will just throw it away and buy a 10$ crock pot than can be used by anybody willing to cook some food.
customer_reviews.author: sixmetters

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after 1 year!
customer_reviews.text: We loved using this Mellow Sous Vide Machine! It was really convenient to have the pre-cooling feature. It also works really well to have timed meals using their pre-programmed recipes. Unfortunately, you cannot delay the start of cooking when you use manual mode to cook something that is not listed in their pre-program recipes. After 1 year and 3 months, the sous vide broke permanently. It says the water temperature is 130 degrees when it is full of ice water. There is no way to recalibrate the thermometer and it will no longer heat the water. Customer support is non-existent. Guess it's time to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

product_meta.title: Mellow Sous Vide Precision Cooker: Smart Slow Cooking Machine with Refrigeration for Home Kitchen with WiFi
feature_bullets: MAKE AMAZING MEALS SIMPLY: Mellow makes it simple to create amazing meals using sous-vide, a method of slow cooking in a temperature-controlled bath once limited to top chefs in the best restaurants.

FROM ORDINARY COOK TO EXTRAORDINARY CHEF: Mellow’s in-app assistant chef with detailed recipes makes it easy to cook your meal to perfection every time. Choose from a broad range of categories, including health-conscious meals with extraordinary taste.

MEALS READY WHEN YOU ARE, WITHOUT THE FUSS: Let Mellow know when you want your meal to be ready, and then drop it into the cool water bath. Chill the water bath ahead of time using the Pre-Cooling feature or immediately using the Add Ice feature. Mellow’s patented refrigeration will keep the food safely chilled until it’s ready to start cooking, and then automatically heats the water at the right time so your meal is ready when you are.

SAVE TIME AND ENERGY: Everything you need to make amazing meals in one sleek solution. Easy-clean proprietary double-walled water container with efficient heating and cooling help keep cleanup simple and energy bills low.
STAY FLEXIBLE: Running late? Built-in wifi connectivity allows you to adjust your Mellow's temperature and cooking time on your smartphone from anywhere. Available on iPhone or Android.
